questions.text: List a share’s name and its code.
List full details for all shares with a price less than $1.
List the names and prices of all shares with a price of at least $10.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrfirm, shrprice FROM shr WHERE shrprice >= 10.00

questions.text: Create a report showing firm name, share price, share holding, and total value of shares held. (Value of shares held is price times quantity.)
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrfirm, shrprice, shrqty, shrqty*shrprice FROM shr

questions.text: List the names of all shares with a yield exceeding 5 percent.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrfirm, shrdiv/shrprice*100 FROM shr WHERE shrdiv/shrprice*100 > 5

questions.text: Report the total dividend payment of Patagonian Tea. (The total dividend payment is dividend times quantity.)
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrdiv*shrqty FROM shr WHERE shrfirm = 'Patagonian Tea'

questions.text: Find all shares where the price is less than 20 times the dividend.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode, shrfirm FROM shr WHERE shrprice < 20*shrdiv

questions.text: Find the share(s) with the minimum yield.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode, shrfirm, shrdiv/shrprice*100 FROM shr WHERE shrdiv/shrprice = (SELECT MIN(shrdiv/shrprice) FROM shr)

questions.text: Find the total value of all shares with a PE ratio > 10.
questions.solution_query: SELECT SUM (shrprice*shrqty) FROM shr WHERE shrpe > 10

questions.text: Find the share(s) with the maximum total dividend payment.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode, shrfirm FROM shr WHERE shrdiv*shrqty = (SELECT MAX(shrdiv*shrqty) FROM shr)

questions.text: Find the value of the holdings in Abyssinian Ruby and Sri Lankan Gold.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrfirm, shrprice*shrqty FROM shr WHERE shrfirm IN ('Abyssinian Ruby', 'Sri Lankan Gold')

questions.text: Find the yield of all firms except Bolivian Sheep and Canadian Sugar.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode, shrfirm, shrdiv/shrprice*100 FROM shr WHERE shrfirm NOT IN ('Bolivian Sheep', 'Canadian Sugar')

questions.text: Find the total value of the portfolio.
List firm name and value in descending order of value.
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrfirm, shrprice*shrqty FROM shr ORDER BY shrprice*shrqty DESC

questions.text: List shares with a firm name containing “Gold.”
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode,shrfirm FROM shr WHERE shrfirm REGEXP 'Gold'

questions.text: Find shares with a code starting with “B.”
questions.solution_query: SELECT shrcode, shrfirm FROM shr WHERE shrcode REGEXP '^B'
